name: pisg-mod
tagline: Fork of pisg with additional statistic features
body:
### What is this?
This is a pisg fork with additional features (mainly estimations) that could be useful to know how an IRC channel would perform the next days.

### Where should I use this? With what?
You should use this software with an IRC client/bot that supports the original pisg (since it is going to parse its logs to make its statistics) and obviously a webserver or a mean to serve the HTML pages generated by pisg.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
